alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 3:21PM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for a storm total of 6 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Clinton, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Western Essex and Southern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to periodically moderate snow this afternoon will taper off late this evening and come to an end by Sunday morning. Gusty northwest winds up to 45 mph will develop this afternoon and continue into the overnight hours. Blowing snow may develop and significantly reduce visibility across the region.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Clinton; Western Essex
